fr.ensicaen.lbssc.ensilink.loader

Class DatabaseCloner

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.ensicaen.lbssc.ensilink.loader.DatabaseCloner

  • final class DatabaseCloner
extends java.lang.Object
    This class clone the online database in the local one.
